system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.ASTJrSsAlGdEGNe4]{Point Blank Shot}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.KnQYQS89B1Pyjddu]{Precise Shot}

Benefits

Your target only receives half of the bonus to DEF due to cover. This feat has no effect against foes with no cover or total cover.

Normal

Cover gives the full bonus to defense depending on how much cover the target currently has.
